column5: Didn't take long for Peter @ www.fishcrazy.ca to put us on fish. Looking for a guide in the Toronto area - he's the guy. https://youtu.be/zkeo5k10ckI
Were you guys fishing Lake Simcoe or the Kawarthas? As a guy who grew up in Peterborough, I can tell you any resident of the Kawarthas would be offended if you described them as Toronto Area.
Exactly Thanks from the KawarthasNice fish though. Thanks for posting the video
We were fishing a Kawartha Lake an hour outside of Toronto. Sent from my iPhone using Tapatalk
Which Kawartha lake ? It's a long chain of lakes.

The change known around here as the tri-lakes (Chemong, Pigeon and Buckhorn) all have muskies in them. More of a numbers area rather than size but the odd 50 incher is caught. Alot of other lakes in the area have muskies but the tri-lakes are mostly targeted.
